startup.name: Gitter
startup.product_desc:
Gitter helps people who create software communicate better.

Built on top of GitHub, we provide public and private chat rooms. With deep integration into issues, commits, pull requests and activity as well as full markdown in chat, including syntax highlighting, there's no stronger technical chat product on the market.

Gitter goes beyond programmers, whilst powerful, the interface is simple and can easily by used by any area of the organisation, bringing a company closer to the technology that powers it.

startup.name: Wegilant
startup.product_desc:
BlackHound: BlackHound is a dynamic web security auditor on cloud. It can audit a website for security only through its URL. BlackHound generate the very strong & developer friendly report for developers for patching the identified vulnerabilities.

Checkout sample audit report generated by BlackHound at http://cloud.wegilant.com/blackhound/sample-report/

WhiteHound: WhiteHound is a static source code analyzer for security for PHP based web application. It also allow developers to patch their website code for identified vulnerabilities with just few clicks. Company has plans to extend the solution for more technologies & platforms in upcoming versions.

startup.name: MakeSpace
startup.product_desc:
MakeSpace is Your Closet in the Cloud (TM) -- convenient, simple, on-demand storage solution that takes  the "self" out of "self storage."  Our customers literally never have to visit a self-storage facility again without sacrificing knowing what they've put away. 

A friendly MakeSpace team member delivers high quality, durable, reusable plastic bins to a customer's home which they then fill with whatever they want to store. We aren't limited to the bins though-- we are happy to store other items including bicycles or oversized items that fit into one of our oversized cardboard boxes (as long as one person can carry it)

Our team returns and transports the customer's bins to our secure storage facility until they decide they want them back. Customers can see what they have in storage on our website or mobile app and include pictures of what's inside the bin for easy retrieval. Customer's belongings can be returned to them in as little as 24 hours for a small fee.

startup.name: abcd
startup.product_desc: asdasdsad

startup.name: Hailo
startup.product_desc: Use Hailo to get a black cab wherever you are, whenever you want. All it takes is two taps on your iPhone or Android Phone. Pay cash or card, with no charges above the meter.

startup.name: Hailo
startup.product_desc: Use Hailo to get a black cab wherever you are, whenever you want. All it takes is two taps on your iPhone or Android Phone. Pay cash or card, with no charges above the meter.

startup.name: Fleetic
startup.product_desc:
We started the Fleetic project with three main goals in mind. The main goal and driving force  was a desire to improve on what was already available in the social media market. Our second goal was to offer a learning tool with potential applications in high school and university environments. The last and the most important, was to build on existing technologies to provide more accurate, direct and private exchange of information, if you like. What really excites us, is the possibility to offer an interface with greater user side customisation (which fall within our terms of use conditions).

Our new tool/application design process dictates that after designing a new tool, we first need to finish the tool and test if our new tool works and provides real user side benefits before release.

We like the idea of ​​trying to outdo the competition. Breaking  the language barrier is our first goal.

startup.name: W;nk
startup.product_desc: Wink is an OTT messaging platform and API allowing users to creatively share a wealth of multimedia content in a succinct and playful way.
startup.high_concept: P L A Y F U L   C O N T E N T  S H A R I N G

startup.name: Hippo Reads
startup.product_desc: Hippo Reads unites rigorous academic insight with real world issues, bridging a necessary knowledge gap in the current media marketplace. Our online curations feature in-depth analysis of critical topics and have been called “TED talks for readers.” Our services arm, Services for Thought Leaders, provides a research and content team for influencers like business leaders CEOs, and Hippo Edu further relates these core values to secondary and college-aged students.

startup.name: Servesy
startup.product_desc:
Servesy is a one touch booking app with 20+ Handyman Services. Our pre-validated technicians are reliable and assure on-time service. Our vision is to help people with household chores so that you get more time for family and work. Our Standard rates ensure our users get the best price in market without any hassle and negotiations.

You can download the Beta app at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.servesy.

startup.name: Scout
startup.product_desc:
Scout: next-generation home security made sleek, smart and affordable.

Home security is a commodity and most of the 17% of the country that has security is dissatisfied with their provider.  Scout is changing the game by offering a system with no long term contracts, the latest technology and a modern design that is worthy of a modern home.  It's an affordable, renter-friendly solution for the other 80% of the country.

startup.name: NoteBowl
startup.product_desc: NoteBowl is developing a campus life solution for higher education that aggregates all information and people into one social platform. Our vision is to create a user-friendly platform where any member of a campus community can connect with others, collaborate on work, and ultimately be more efficient in achieving their everyday tasks. And since everyone is in one place, we can leverage the data generated on the platform to give administrators the necessary information to increase student engagement and identify students who are at a high-risk of dropping out. Through this data analysis, we can increase student success both inside and outside the classroom. Furthermore, we provide a universal messaging system and the ability to directly market university services to students based on their needs and interests, thus potentially unlocking new revenue streams. NoteBowl also integrates legacy learning management and administrative systems into one beautiful and intuitive user interface.

startup.name: Aureole Technologies Private Limited
startup.product_desc: A-iPAS is an ERP Mobility Enabler for Manufacturing Plants. Our target is all the large manufacturing plants enabled with SAP ERP. Our solution would be deployed on-top of SAP and would complement the SAP implementation. We have 5 Successful Factory installations and are growing. Our customers see a huge benefit in-terms of enhanced productivity, traceability, inventory accuracy, enhanced Safety and over all reduction in operating costs.

startup.name: philosophie
startup.product_desc: philosophie designs and develops digital products for visionaries.

startup.name: In-Descent Proposal
startup.product_desc: In-Descent Proposal in cooperation with corporate sponsorship aims to provide adventure seekers with the fighter jet training experience of a lifetime. The company will also be able to provide potential sponsors exceptional public relations visibility around the world at airshows and other events; contributing to the awareness of special causes and aviation education, and becoming the premier aerial advertising platform with over 27M impressions annually.  Our core company strength will reside in our ingenuity, drive, passion, and professionalism with 14 years of combined military and civilian aviation experience.

startup.name: WorkMeIn
startup.product_desc: WorkMeIn's goal is to dramatically increase the efficiency of care coordination between healthcare providers. Our software increases the efficiency of primary care physicians, provides specialist physicians with a better patient mix, and allows insurance companies and healthcare systems to help ensure patients stay in network. As a result, patients get higher quality, more affordable, more appropriate care with better outcomes.

startup.name: Taggle
startup.product_desc:
Reviews Reimagined.

http://taggle.com

Authentic reviews are a new currency. Might as well have fun making the most of it. 

Taggle is a unique, gamified and personalized review system. Taggle aims to harness the full potential of reviews in order to help consumers find what they need and want and to help brands improve reputation and sales.

startup.name: Meeker Apartment Rentals
startup.product_desc: We purchase apartment complexes and make them like a resort feel for the everyday families.

startup.name: BetaTrek
startup.product_desc:
BetaTrek is designed to change the way we grasp market movements and business decisions from data.  BetaTrek provides social media and intelligent analysis for guiding investment strategies and statistical decisions.  

By collecting multiple sources of data streams through either public sources or proprietary data sets, BetaTrek is able to produce high level valuable insights about companies, markets and trends.  Our belief is with more relationships between data the more accurate and confidence decisions from data becomes.

We are hoping to release screen shots very soon and we are looking for a serious iOS developer to help bring our product to market.
startup.high_concept: Data Analytics, Search and Social Media

startup.product_desc: Turnpike helps email receivers determine which emails their users want to receive. This in turn helps valued senders get wanted emails delivered to their customer's inboxes.

startup.name: Fitocracy
startup.product_desc:
Fitocracy is a fitness social network that empowers everyone to reach their next level of health. We connect you to people who can inspire, motivate, and guide you to be a more awesome person. 

We help you track your progress, get support and motivation from an amazing community, and receive instruction and guidance from professionals to help you reach your goals.

Download the app that's getting rave reviews here: http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/fitocracy/id509253726?mt=8
startup.high_concept: Social fitness network that empowers everyone to succeed at fitness in the long term

startup.name: NinjaMyApp
startup.product_desc:
➤ Push Notifications
➤ Multiple Ad Network SDKs
➤ Data Driven App Platform
➤ Hosted Media Storage & Download
➤ Custom App Logic

startup.high_concept: API driven SDKs for mobile app developers

startup.name: ThereNow
startup.product_desc:
ThereNow is a communications platform that connects large, remote viewing audiences with the small group of people on-scene breaking news/emergency events.

Due to the disproportionate size of the two parties - small groups vs. hundreds of thousands of potential viewers - ThereNow uses broadcast news media outlets to foster a dialogue of relevant photos, video clips, answers, and audio interviews.
startup.high_concept: The Waze of breaking news/emergency events

startup.name: BTCJam
startup.product_desc:
Did you know that borrowing money can be a serious challenge depending on your credit situation, or if the need of it is immediate? 
Good people worldwide who can afford paying the cost of money, need to borrow it but can’t do so immediately. There are many roadblocks, the main ones being a high level of bureaucracy and high interest rates.
BTCJam is the first and leading GLOBAL peer to peer lending platform, and the first to offer a global credit score to its users. It's a disruptive credit model powered by the bitcoin economy which helps its members:
- crowd-fund loans at a chosen rate 
 - diversify investments on a global scale 
 - develop a globally credentialed credit profile
BTCJam promotes lending without borders where people can borrow and lend bitcoins, without having to worry about banks and other intermediaries. Transactions are instantaneous, hassle free, and supported by a trusting community.
We are changing how the financial system operates globally, one bitcoin at time.

startup.name: halftale
startup.product_desc: Halftale enables families to collaboratively gather personal media easily and privately.

startup.name: Tuition.io
startup.product_desc: Tuition.io is a revolutionary new tool for managing your student loans that lets you optimize your debt for your unique situation.

startup.name: Fixit
startup.product_desc: Fixit is a work-record management SaaSfocused around the product, repair industry, and their customers. Our aim is to capture the repair history of individual products in real time using a new social networking environment for all parties involved. Technicians will be able to tag any product with our Fixit for future access. Our motto," Why look for something that should already be there." We currently have a catalog of over 80k products with full specs in our database and will be scaling up to 1.5m when we go live.
startup.high_concept: Fixing the world one product at a time

startup.name: august
startup.product_desc:
Smartphone controlled door locks by experienced founders.  Dev-name was Kease.

Key features:

- Self installation in 10 minutes;
- The smallest electronic door lock on the market (8.5cm x 5cm); and
- Many other, to be announced, features.

startup.name: Hotelied, Inc.
startup.product_desc:
Hotelied is a new hotel booking site that offers a different approach to pricing and booking lifestyle and luxury hotels.  Hotelied can be described as a "dating site" for hotel stays, whereby individual travelers are matched with personalized rates and offers, based on a variety of profile and trip attributes. 

Hotelied recognizes the fact that not all travelers present the same value to hotels, and provides hotels with a platform to specifically target and customize their offerings to the most lucrative traveler segments, allowing travelers to access un-published discounts at some of the best hotels in the world.

startup.name: LinkMyStory
startup.product_desc:
We have created protected social media platform to address three main concerns from users

1. Privacy of your data
2. Organizing public and private data at one place
3. Pass on your stories to next generation

Major Features

Group Stories - Build stories together with friends and families - Vacations, Camping, Events and many more....
Capture - Upload Pictures, Videos, Documents...Even from past
Organize - Tags to find them easily : Birthdays, Wedding, Anniversaries and many more....
Share Privately - Every story is private. You can select who can access your story

GET YOUR CONTROL NOW
startup.high_concept: Create Stories and Share privately with Friends and Family for life, for generations

Bills.com empowers everyday consumers to make better financial decisions.
 
We have tons of cool and totally free financial tools, calculators, and advice to help make the world of personal finance accessible,  while providing the appropriate resources and opportunities for people to save money every day.

startup.name: Weekly
startup.product_desc:
Weekly turns your online reading list into a personalized newspaper. 

Simply save articles you find throughout the week and we'll deliver them to your door in a beautiful traditional paper every weekend.
startup.high_concept: The first analog newspaper for the digital age

startup.name: airenvy
startup.product_desc:
Airenvy’s mission is to provide lucrative yet hassle free full service short term property management all around the world
 
I like to think Airenvy is creating a new way for people to become excited again about property management and love their property managers.
 
First use case for Airenvy clients those who want to utilize rooms and homes without lifting a finger very quickly moves to second use case to optimize price and maximize occupancy and revenue.

Three words to describe the service benefits: Passive, Income Generating, Effortless, more time for you what you love
 
Currently a lot of stagnation on innovation on the industry – Bringing innovation by allowing communication and transparency, on demand results.

Airenvy is your friend nextdoor.

Neighborhood Managers are your friend, trust, reliance he life blood, bringing that experience to you and your guests

startup.name: CellScope
startup.product_desc:
CellScope is mobile-health startup building systems for at-home diagnosis and a recent graduate of Rock Health’s first class of startups. Using smartphone cameras connected to a web platform, Cellscope is creating the digital first aid kit.

Our first product is a smartphone-enabled otoscope for remote diagnosis of pediatric ear infections. In the lives of busy parents, this means less missed work, fewer late-night ER visits, and increased revenue for doctors.
startup.high_concept: We're turning your smartphone into a digital first aid kit.

startup.name: Pley
startup.product_desc:
Pley is building the next generation of play. We put the power of educational toys in people’s hands in a more affordable, convenient and eco-friendly way.   

Pley’s goal is to change the very paradigm of playtime for kids by providing an affordable subscription service for educational toys. Leveraging collaborative consumption, we aim to raise a more creative and skillful generation that follows the principles of open-ended play and waste reduction, while emphasizing the benefits of sharing and giving back to the community.
startup.high_concept: Netflix-like rental service for LEGO sets

startup.name: Dayjam
startup.product_desc:
What is DayJam?

DayJam is a kick ass social media platform that takes existentialism to another level, the highlight reel of posting content. The social media world is completely over-saturated, now is the time for a limited post network, a place where every post by a user is center stage shining in the spotlight. DayJam users are allowed to post one song, video, status/blog, photo, and a link and thus creating one combined post. 

Why limited post?

Setting boundaries and limitations can bring out the most creativity in a human being. It establishes a canvas, It can also be a prerequisite for critical thinking, bringing out what's most important from within; a natural filter. This methodology also sets a level playing field for content to be seen, reducing the possibility of being drowned out by spam. 

What's Your DayJam? 

Everyone has a favorite song, a favorite photo, video, etc. etc., and because of this we want to spread a question worldwide, Whats Your DayJam?
startup.high_concept: The simplest, fastest, and easiest way to share your favorite stuff to the world

startup.name: GigsTime
startup.product_desc:
1. Social networking website with a focus on providing a medium for music artists to share, release, demo, and broadcast their music.
2. Gives music labels an additional way to receive demos, network with artists, promote their existing artists and advertise   new music.
3. Solves the frustrating problem of how to share music on the internet interactively without risking loss of revenue to file sharing.
4. Everyone likes to get free service to promote their music’s or downloads etc.
5. Moreover free service is not take a time to get improve, while on improve on your music you preferred on paying services.
6. With this a larger number of fan base, you have a greater chance of selling more music.

GigsTime is not just a Music Social Network – it is positioning itself as the foundation of the entire social web

http://www.slideshare.net/sagarrana233/gigs-time-company-profile
startup.high_concept: ♫ GigsTime is a great place to hang out for all music lovers ♫

startup.name: PressFriendly
startup.product_desc:
PressFriendly teaches companies how to manage outbound PR and works as a virtual PR agency. We take the institutional knowledge of a PR practitioner and turn it into a dead-simple software service that just works.

Press Coverage
TechCrunch: http://techcrunch.com/2014/02/06/give-a-man-a-pitch-or-teach-a-man-to-pitch/
VentureBeat: http://venturebeat.com/2014/02/06/pressfriendly-launches-virtual-pr-firm-so-startups-dont-need-to-hire-an-agency/
Inc.: http://www.inc.com/ed-zitron/public-relations-startup-pressfriendly.html 
PR Week: http://www.prweekus.com/article/pressfriendly-debuts-pitch-builder-support-platform/1283517

PressFriendly also connects companies to the reporters most likely to write about them. We use machine learning to match the pitch (developed by the company) to reporter archives. These "smart" media lists allow for better and more effective PR pitching. For the reporters, they get pitches that are more relevant.

startup.name: MakeSimply
startup.high_concept: Hardware Product Development, Sourcing and Manufacturing Management.
